name: Lee, Geun
title: Professor
description: Lee Geun is a professor specializing in the field of designing propulsion systems for multi-seated public transport vehicles. He focuses on smart mobility, urban transportation systems, and smart city-related research, authorship, and consulting. From 2015 to 2017, he was part of the Seoul Design Foundation, where he worked on projects related to public transportation design and city infrastructure. His research covers a wide range of areas in the transportation sector, including future mobility concepts like smart transportation and smart cities. Additionally, he is passionate about public transportation systems, and how they relate to urban mobility, transit, and vehicle design. His current focus is on furthering research in the smart mobility field, examining trends and conducting further studies.

details.major: Future Mobility Design, Urban Transportation System Design

name: Koo, Sang
title: Professor
description: Prof. Jae Kim is interested in social, cultural, and ethical consequences of emerging technologies. His research focuses on Human Centered Interaction and Intelligent (AI) products and services which includes voice and natural interface. He led various UX design projects such as Microsoft AI Assistant, AI Speaker, AI powered IoT devices and Smart TV at Microsoft Ai, Nokia and Samsung. He majored in communication design at Parsons School of Design in New York and received a master degree in design interactions from Royal College of Arts in London. He also participated in global exhibitions and conferences including Microsoft Ai & Data science Conference, MoMA, London Design Festival, and Helsinki Design Week
